channel.title: No slow walk
channel.description:
i cant get past the rocket chamber because no matter what i do alt does nothing i have tried changing it to other keys but i walk at the same speed i hear my footsteps and the monster gets me, nothing is working
anyone able to get the slow walk to work
crouching still makes it hear you

item.title: No slow walk
item.dc:creator: Giazzo
item.description:
Crouching will do that, even if it makes you move reeeeally slow.

But I suggest practising more with the grenades/satchel mode. It’s less “the noise you make walking” and more “the noise you make to distract it”. A bit of tactics in throwing and sprinting, and you’ll make it. (source: I passed that exact point ten minutes ago).

Read full topic

item.description:
Hope it works

Read full topic

item.title: No slow walk
item.dc:creator: Noha
item.description:
Harry-UK:

Crouching is silent. I crawled around there 3 times (to get to the different chambers and back) without being heard once.

its not silent for me i can hear the footsteps and it hears me!

Read full topic

item.title: No slow walk
item.dc:creator: Harry-UK
item.description:
Crouching is silent. I crawled around there 3 times (to get to the different chambers and back) without being heard once.

item.title: No slow walk
item.dc:creator: nefatheape
item.description:
uncle_revie:

Walk?

im sure you walk then just shift to sprint

You’re referring to the HL2 controls, and in this case the “walk” function key does not work – it does nothing.

“Always run” toggled is actually “Always sprint” and the sprint key becomes the run key. No walk button. Really annoying.

Read full topic

im sure you walk then just shift to sprint

item.title: No slow walk
item.dc:creator: Ahnteis
item.description:
Mont_Blanc:

Use grenades and/or satchel charges to distract them while you make your moves.

Yes, but then your footsteps make it turn back to you. In the original, you can hold down +WALK and it won’t hear you. I had to resort to god mode to get past the @#$@ thing. Even with nades/satchels.

Read full topic

item.title: No slow walk
item.dc:creator: nefatheape
item.description:
No, walk doesn’t work and it’s driving me nuts. And I haven’t gotten to the blast chamber yet, so this is disgruntling news to look forward to.

Read full topic
